data.name: Small Rusty Kitchen Knife
data.description: The blade is shorter than the handle.

data.name: Rusty Cooking Knife
data.description: The pointy end seems good enough.

data.name: Rusty Cutlery
data.description: A small, brittle knife, verging on uselessness.

data.name: Rusty Eating Knife
data.description: It seems to be falling apart on a continuous basis.

data.name: Rusty Bread Knife
data.description: Despite its intended purpose, this blade will mangle a loaf of bread.

data.name: Black Leather Helmet
data.description: Made in a legionnaire-style, slightly different from the usual designs.

data.name: Fur Hat
data.description: This'll keep you warm, for sure.

data.name: Leather Helmet
data.description: While cheap, it's brand new. Poor quality at its best.

data.name: Patchwork Fur Cloak
data.description: Numerous rodents gave their lives to make this happen.

data.name: Large Fur Boots
data.description: Functional, but aesthetically disproportionate.

data.name: Leather Boots
data.description: These will serve you well across rugged terrain.

data.name: Heavy Fur Coat
data.description: Imported from Tundra Barbarous, this was made for warfare.

data.name: Black Linen Cloak
data.description: The favored garment of those who enslaved you.

data.name: Sturdy Leather Gauntlets
data.description: Fairly good quality. Perhaps a bit bulky.

data.name: Black Leather Boots
data.description: Average quality, neutral design. Can't really go wrong with these.

data.name: Black Silk Tunic
data.description: Quite expensive, yet discrete. The hallmark of true sophistication.

data.name: Brown Leather Cloak
data.description: This style of cloak has become quite fashionable among the vagrants and highwaymen of Tem Khiris.

data.name: Black Toga
data.description: Perfect for the southern regions of Tem Khiris.

data.name: White Toga
data.description: These are all the rage in the Deadlands of Triniset.

data.name: Red Cloth Sandals
data.description: Cheap and comfortable.

data.name: Red Apple
data.description: Fruit. Restores a small amount of health.

data.name: Strawberry
data.description: Berry. Restores a small amount of health.

data.name: Pear
data.description: Fruit. Restores a small amount of health.

data.name: Dog Steak
data.description: The charred flesh of a wild mongrel. Restores a small amount of health.

data.name: Factotum's Journal
data.description: A dusty old book

data.name: Bronze Hunting Knife
data.description: A formidable weapon, although its jagged edges have grown somewhat dull from frequent use.

data.name: Rusty Iron Broadsword
data.description: This sword has seen better days.

data.name: Rusty Iron Longsword
data.description: The blade won't last much longer

data.name: Rusty Iron Gladius
data.description: Good for a few more stabs

data.name: Rusty Iron Claymore
data.description: Not very sharp anymore, but it should be heavy enough to crush a skull or two.

data.name: Rusty Iron Sabre
data.description: Undoubtedly, many have fallen prey to this blade

data.name: Rusty Iron Short Blade
data.description: Imagine, all the lives that have been ruined by this old blade.

data.name: Bronze Hatchet
data.description: This old hatchet has seen better days. More of a skull-basher than a head-chopper, at this point

data.name: Rusty Iron War Axe
data.description: Many battlegrounds ago, this was a pristine weapon

data.name: Rusty Iron Battle Axe
data.description: A two-handed axe, way past its prime

data.name: Rusty Iron Halberd
data.description: A two-handed polearm. Probably stolen from a dead guardsman

data.name: Rusty Iron Hatchet
data.description: A trail of severed limbs led to its current state

data.name: Stone Axe
data.description: Plausibly, this crude weapon was crafted before the Great Cataclysm

data.name: Bronze Scepter
data.description: This crude weapon seems ancient.

data.name: Rusty Iron Mace
data.description: This mace has cracked a few skulls in its day

data.name: Rusty Iron Flail
data.description: A spiked ball on a chain, attached to a stick. What will they think of next?

data.name: Rusty Iron Morning Star
data.description: The impact of this weapon will make you see stars.

data.name: Stone Maul
data.description: A two-handed stone hammer from the dawn of time

data.name: Raven Mask
data.description: A white wooden mask, sculpted to resemble a raven's beak, surrounded by a pattern of sharp feathers.

data.name: Bone Dagger
data.description: Crude and ominous, like a yellow fang stolen from the jaws of an ancient beast.

data.name: Volcanic Stone Dagger
data.description: Made from the elusive red rock, quarried on the Isle of Penance

data.name: Raspberry
data.description: Berry. Restores a small amount of health.

data.name: Blueberry
data.description: Berry. Restores a small amount of health.

data.name: Cipher Stone
data.description: A tetrahedron, cut from limestone. Inscriptions cover the stone on all sides. The object can be used to interpret hieroglyphs.

data.name: Iron Key, No. 17
data.description: A heavy iron key from the ruins of Dusk Megalith.

data.name: Iron Key, No. 8
data.description: A heavy iron key. You found it among the possessions of a dying forest-dweller.

data.name: Iron Key, No. 11
data.description: A heavy iron key from the ruins of Dusk Megalith.

data.name: Heavy Iron Lever
data.description: Stolen from the altar of a subterranean chapel.

data.name: Torch
data.description: Fire. A great discovery, if there ever was one.

data.name: Shovel
data.description: A sturdy old shovel, good for diggin'

data.name: Death Mask
data.description: A white mask, stolen from a toxic sarcophagus in the catacombs of Dusk Megalith.

data.name: Emerald
data.description: Green gemstone. Finely cut.

data.name: Ruby
data.description: Red gemstone. Finely cut.

data.name: Diamond
data.description: A finely cut gemstone. Quite valuable.

data.name: Golden Chalice
data.description: A ceremonial chalice, stolen from the crypts of Dusk Megalith.

data.name: Silver Chalice
data.description: A ceremonial chalice, stolen from the crypts of Dusk Megalith.

data.name: Diamond Ring
data.description: This ancient wedding ring was stolen from the crypts of Dusk Megalith.

data.name: Amethyst
data.description: A purple gemstone, finely cut.

parameters: This antique will provide some protection...

data.name: Golden Bracelet
data.description: Adorned with hieroglyphs, this bracelet was stolen from the crypts of Dusk Megalith.

data.name: Iron Broadsword
data.description: Black as night. The blade is sharp.

data.name: Iron Sabre
data.description: The curved blade is sharp.

data.name: Iron Hatchet
data.description: Remarkably well-preserved.

data.name: Iron War Axe
data.description: The work of a talented blacksmith.

data.name: Iron Flail
data.description: A spiked iron ball, attached to a chain with a handle.

data.name: Iron Morning Star
data.description: A spiked iron club.

data.name: Bronze Mail
data.description: This heavy suit of armor will provide ample protection.

data.name: Tarnished Plate Cuirass
data.description: Slightly tarnished. Nevertheless, this heavy armor piece will provide ample protection.

data.name: Bronze War Gauntlets
data.description: These will guard your grip in the heat of battle.

data.name: Bronze Helmet
data.description: This ancient helmet provides ample protection, covering everything except the lower half of the face.

data.name: Small Book
data.description: A leather-bound book, its covers soiled by dirt and damaged by water.

data.name: Green Cloak
data.description: A pristine, hooded cloak. The favored garment among druids, earning them the nickname "green-cloaks".

data.name: Fur Moccasins
data.description: These knee-high moccasins have been sown to resemble wolf paws, with actual claws protruding from the front.

data.name: Iron Sickle
data.description: The curved blade is sharp.

data.name: Wolf Gauntlets
data.description: These war gloves have been sown to resemble wolf paws, with claws protruding from the knuckles.

data.name: Copper Ring
data.description: A simple ring, typically worn by commoners.

data.name: Mask of Nierva
data.description: A thin, circular white mask. Almost featureless, aside from the narrow, horizontal apertures for the eyes and mouth.

data.name: Iron Short Sword
data.description: Frequently used, but well-maintained.

data.name: Fine Bronze Sabre
data.description: The curved blade is quite sharp. Elaborately sculpted, the pommel resembles a demonic serpent.

data.name: Bronze Gladius
data.description: A well-placed thrust will suffice to vanquish the enemy.

data.name: Iron Bracelets
data.description: Faded hieroglyphs adorn these old bracelets.

data.name: Crude Lock Pick
data.description: This tool can be used to disable simple locks.

data.name: Expensive Fur Coat
data.description: White foxes of Tundra Barbarous died for the sake of this ostentatious display.

data.name: Crimson Veil
data.description: One of many ways to shroud yourself in mystery.

data.name: Black Leather Gloves
data.description: Quality leather, almost brand new, perfect fit - what more can you ask for?

parameters: charisma

data.name: Strange Fruit
data.description: Fruit. Possibly edible. Resembles the shape of a lemon, but slightly smaller with a deep green color.

data.name: Bronze Punch Dagger
data.description: Some hoodlums are brawlers, some rogues are knife thugs. Some ruffians want the best of both underworlds.

data.name: Rusty Iron Butcher Knife
data.description: A cruel weapon.

data.name: Bronze Scimitar
data.description: Who could resist such fine curvature? Certainly not humans, or other things made of flesh.

data.name: Iron Rapier
data.description: Requires some finesse.

data.name: Silver Brooch
data.description: A cloak pin made of silver. It's shaped like a stingray. The mere sight of it brings back a lot of bad memories.

data.name: Filthy Pipe
data.description: A handy tool, designed to incinerate substances for the purpose of smoke inhalation. This one has been used frequently, to say the least.

data.name: Clogs
data.description: Wooden shoes. Somehow, foul odors have been infused into the fibers.

data.name: Slouch Hat
data.description: A brown hat with a wide brim. The layers of sweat can be analyzed to determine which year this hat was manufactured.

data.name: Shiv
data.description: A makeshift blade, designed for quick stabbin'

data.name: Sackcloth Tunic
data.description: Not the most glamorous of garments.

data.name: Bronze Javelin
data.description: This short spear can be held in one hand.

data.name: Bronze Halberd
data.description: This heavy polearm is in excellent condition.

data.name: Fine Bronze Halberd
data.description: This heavy polearm seems almost unused.

data.name: Brown Leather Gambeson
data.description: This long-sleeved leather coat affords the wearer with ample protection.

data.name: Brown Leather Gloves
data.description: Oddly discolored and somewhat odorous, these gloves have definitely seen better days.

data.name: Brown Leather Helmet
data.description: This old piece of headgear has been pummeled a few times.

data.name: Brown Leather Boots
data.description: Slightly cumbersome and noticeably odorous, these boots have been worn out from frequent use.

data.name: Bronze Longsword
data.description: Aside from a few notches on the blade, this sword is in excellent condition.

data.name: Leather Sandals
data.description: Knee-high leather sandals. Thin leather strips afford meagre protection, but allows for nimble movement.

data.name: Leather Bracers
data.description: Starting beneath the elbows, these brown leather bracers will protect your forearms and the backsides of your hands.

data.name: Moon Orchid
data.description: Ingredient. A blue flower, unlike anything you've ever seen before. Fragile and beautiful.

data.name: Pale Hyacinth
data.description: Ingredient. A white and yellow flower. Incredibly rare.

parameters: A flower so beautiful, it's breathtaking. Literally. Slowly, your throat swells up, giving you time to reflect on this cautionary tale.

data.name: Luminous Rose
data.description: Ingredient. A white rose, famously exuberant in moonlight. Rarely found on Tem Khiris.

data.name: Gray Snapdragon
data.description: Ingredient. A gray flower, popular among the nomads of Tem Khiris, who use it for medicinal purposes.

parameters: You soon realize that eating those sharp petals was a bad idea. Feeling nauseous and woozy, you drop to your knees and vomit blood on the ground. This goes on for a while, until you finally lose consciousness. A painful death, if there ever was one.

data.name: Cloud Petal
data.description: Ingredient. Once plucked from the rare flower known as Nierva's Crown, this petal quickly hardens into a pale shard, presently sharp enough to pierce your skin.

parameters: You chew on the poisonous plant until you begin to feel sick. Sweating profusely, you find it hard to breathe. After a short while, you collapse on the ground, choking to death.

data.name: Noxious Weed
data.description: Ingredient. Commonly found on Tem Khiris, these poisonous leaves are frequently used in various medicinal concoctions.

parameters: They call it "toxic" for a reason. In spite of this, you devoured the poisonous plant. And guess what? You're dead. Funny how things work out.

data.name: Toxic Nettle
data.description: Ingredient. Commonly used by medical practitioners among the nomads and druids of Tem Khiris. May counter the adverse effects of other poisonous substances.

parameters: Your gums bleed when you try to chew the dark twigs. Maybe this wasn't such a great idea. A few seconds later, you fall flat on the ground, completely paralyzed. Trembling uncontrollably, you endure infathomable torment until your heart finally stops beating. Sometimes, death can be a relief.

data.name: Thorn of Meym
data.description: Ingredient. Taken from the spiky shrub known as Meym's Beard, found exclusively on the Isle of Dusk. These darks twigs are incredibly poisonous.

data.name: Leather Shoes
data.description: A pair of sturdy leather shoes. Made for a hard day's work.

data.name: Iron Circlet
data.description: A crude iron circlet, riddled with impurities.

data.name: Heavy Bronze Scythe
data.description: In the right hands, this ominous weapon is potentially a force to be reckoned with.

data.name: Heavy Iron Scythe
data.description: Black as night, this tool was made to reap souls and crops alike.

parameters: This will protect you in the heat of battle...

data.name: Wooden Bracelet
data.description: Sculpted to resemble rooks, wolves and serpentine flames.

data.name: Wolf Necklace
data.description: A crude necklace, made from rock pebbles and wolf teeth.

data.name: Poems and Pipe Dreams, Vol. II
data.description: A small black book.

data.name: Antidote
data.description: Medicine. A small, transparent flask. It contains poison antidote.

data.name: Studded Leather Cuirass
data.description: Studded black leather. Incredibly robust. The result of fine craftmanship.

data.name: Iron Dagger
data.description: The quintessential black iron dagger, favored by the rogues and assassins of Tem Khiris.

data.name: Iron Scepter
data.description: If nothing else, this weapon commands respect.

data.name: Bandages
data.description: Medical supplies. Enough to mend three wounds.

data.name: Red Cloak
data.description: A red linen cloak. The unusual color makes it slightly less affordable.

data.name: Black Turban
data.description: These are supposedly fashionable among Panossian elites.

data.name: Gold Tooth
data.description: Extracted from the mouth of a desecrated corpse.

data.name: Silver Earrings
data.description: Ripped from the ears of a desecrated corpse.

data.name: Glass Eye
data.description: Green iris. Removed from the left eye socket of a desecrated corpse.

data.name: Wooden Hand
data.description: A fanciful prosthetic limb. It was accidentally damaged when it was removed from the previous owner, which reduced the functionality of its crude mechanisms.

parameters: This robust ankle bracelet will provide some protection...

data.name: Bronze Ankle Bracelet
data.description: Fashionable among the native druids on the Isle of Dusk.

data.name: Recipe: Antidote
data.description: A handwritten recipe has been scrawled on this parchment.

data.name: The Transgression of Hieram Vot
data.description: The red covers of this book contain the arguments of three prominent thinkers. The debate concerns the implications of the assassination of Lord Selikro VII.

data.name: Odaia's Book of Memories, vol. 41
data.description: The last journal entries of a druid scholar.

data.name: Goat's Milk
data.description: Beverage. A corked jug of goat's milk. Restores a small amount of health.

data.name: Empty Flask
data.description: Glassware. A small corked flask, perfectly clean and transparent.

data.name: Black Phosphorus
data.description: A unique masterwork morning star, reputedly crafted by the infamous Blacksmith of Woe.

data.name: Fine Bronze Cutlass
data.description: The broad blade of this short sabre is remarkably sharp. The pommel is adorned with hieroglyphs.

data.name: Iron Scythe
data.description: The wooden handle has been reinforced with iron bands. The black blade is sharp enough to harvest souls and crops in equal measure.

data.name: Laudanum
data.description: Contraband/Medicine. A glass jar of opium tincture. Relieves pain quite efficiently, existential or otherwise.

data.name: Prison Ledger
data.description: A heavy tome, stolen from the prison dungeon of Dusk Megalith.

data.name: Bronze Trident
data.description: A heavy bronze trident, adorned with hieroglyphs.

data.name: Iron Mask of Celestial Triad
data.description: A heavy iron mask with three faces: a wolf, a wise sage and a woman.

data.name: Rusty Iron Chainmail
data.description: A full suit of chainmail armor. Old and rusty.

data.name: Master Key
data.description: A heavy iron key. It unlocks the prison of Dusk Megalith.

data.name: Bronze Broadsword
data.description: There are a few notches in this otherwise serviceable blade.

data.name: Bronze Mace
data.description: This blunt weapon has been sculpted to resemble a wolf's paw.

data.name: Amphora of Red Wine
data.description: A clay vessel, which contains the inebriating substance of red wine.

data.name: Ancient Iron Dagger
data.description: A long dagger with serrated edges, plagued by ancient rust.

data.name: Bronze Mallet
data.description: A large-headed hammer with a wooden handle. This tool of creation and destruction was stolen from the grave of a nameless island-dweller.

data.name: Black Diamond
data.description: A finely cut gemstone. Incredibly valuable.

data.name: Heavy Iron Scimitar
data.description: A two-handed iron scimitar. The work of a master blacksmith.

data.name: Pamphlet: The Age of Dusk
data.description: The words of a prophet have been inscribed with common runes on this tattered parchment

data.name: Leather Buckler
data.description: This small, round wooden shield has been reinforced by a coat of stitched wolf hide.

data.name: Bronze Buckler
data.description: This round small shield is unadorned, but highly useful.

data.name: Domed Shield of Rook
data.description: A large round wooden shield, adorned by the painted silhouette of a rook.

data.name: Domed Shield of Dusk
data.description: A large round wooden shield, adorned with a painted sunset.

parameters: A mesmerizing sphere...

data.name: Orb of Reflection
data.description: A spherical mirror, stolen from the Tomb of Hieronymus.

parameters: Unnatural forces linger in the black runes of this red blade.

data.name: Crimson Falcata
data.description: A short-bladed sickle-sword. Made from the elusive red rock, quarried on the Isle of Penance. Crafted by a master blacksmith. Adorned with cryptic runes.

parameters: For better or worse, your personal magnetism is amplified by these crown jewels.

data.description: Five black diamonds adorn this priceless golden circlet.
data.name: Jeweled Circlet

parameters: This exquisite armband is sturdy enough to provide some protection...

data.name: Golden Armband
data.description: A thick golden bracelet, shaped like an ouroboros.

parameters: Your confidence grows when you put the ring on your finger.

data.name: Sapphire Ring
data.description: Shaped like a wreath of serpents, this gold ring is endowed with a sizable gemstone.

data.name: Wooden Staff
data.description: A long stick made of wood. Nothing more to it, really.

data.name: Iron Claymore
data.description: A heavy two-handed sword. The blade is sharp.

parameters: For a moment, you are haunted by visions of death...

data.name: Black Iron Gauntlets
data.description: Heavy iron gauntlets. Crude and cumbersome.

data.name: Rusty Iron Chainmail Shirt
data.description: Chainmail armor, covering the torso. Old and rusty.

data.name: Bag of Loot
data.description: A burlap sack, filled with a variety of stolen goods.

parameters: The smell of brimstone...

data.name: Crown of Wildflowers
data.description: A wreath of exuberant and exotic wildflowers, covering a broad range of colors.

data.name: Silver Candlestick
data.description: Highly ornate. Worth a few coins.

data.name: Golden Candlestick
data.description: Highly ornate. Worth a fair amount of gold.

data.name: Commemorative Plate
data.description: The porcelain is adorned with illustrations and runes that celebrate the abolition of slavery.

parameters: This bracelet is not only expensive, it should provide a small amount of protection...

data.name: Ruby Bracelet
data.description: A golden bracelet with five sizable, rectangular rubies.

data.name: Gold Necklace
data.description: A gold chain without additional adornments.

data.name: Silver Necklace
data.description: A simple design. Sterling silver.

data.name: Gold Ring
data.description: A golden ring without additional adornments.

data.name: Silver Ring
data.description: A silver ring with no additional adornments. Sterling.

data.name: Jade Idol
data.description: Made from a precious, green mineral. Sculpted to resemble the foreign goddess of beauty known as Rhubeya.

data.name: Framed Portrait
data.description: Oil on canvas. Golden frame. Captures the likeness of Lord Selikro VIII. Painted by an unknown artist during the fourth century.

data.name: Red Evening Gown
data.description: Sewn by a master tailor, this dress is made from the finest Panossian silk.

parameters: The garment hinders your movement, but you feel quite beautiful...

data.name: Fraternal Headpiece
data.description: A tall hat which seems comically ornate and elaborate in its design.

parameters: Rich people can certainly have an odd sense of fashion...

data.name: Ceremonial Sash
data.description: A strange belt made from cloth. The fanciful embroideries are esoteric and suggestive.

data.name: Black Dress Shoes
data.description: High-heeled shoes made from wood and cloth, with white embroideries of floral patterns.

parameters: The heels emphasize your figure in a positive way, but they hinder your movement...

data.name: Loaf of Bread
data.description: A sturdy loaf of bread. Provides health and nourishment.

data.name: Block of Cheese
data.description: A sizable brick of cheese from the farmlands of Roeburgh. Provides health and nourishment.

data.name: Blue Cheese
data.description: A lump of blue cheese from the Maleqite Lowlands. Provides health and nourishment.

data.name: Jug of Water
data.description: A clay vessel which contains clean water from a mountain spring. Provides health and hydration.

data.name: Heart of Stone
data.description: Cut from the elusive red rock, famously quarried on the Isle of Penance. Sculpted to resemble a human heart. Found among the ashes of a psychotic druid.

parameters: Clutching the red rock, you feel invigorated...

data.name: Winged Bronze Helmet
data.description: Traditionally worn by the Knights of Roeburgh. The two sections of the visor are held together by a clasp. The metal wings are quite sharp.

data.name: Bronze Plate Cuirass
data.description: Traditionally worn by the Knights of Roeburgh. Slightly dented, but otherwise pristine.

data.name: Bronze Plate Greaves
data.description: Traditionally worn by the Knights of Roeburgh. Protects both legs and feet.

data.name: Bronze Claymore
data.description: A knightly sword with a few notches on the blade.

data.name: Heavy Bronze Broadsword
data.description: A knightly sword used as a sidearm by the mounted cavalry of Roeburgh.

data.name: Blue Kite Shield
data.description: A large triangular shield. Traditionally used by the mounted cavalry among the Knights of Roeburgh.

data.name: Brown Tunic
data.description: This tattered linen garment has been soiled by blood and mead.

data.name: Black Silk Vest
data.description: A comfortable garment. Suitable for milder climates.

data.name: Gray Slouch Hat
data.description: A tall hat with a wide brim.

data.name: Black Scarf
data.description: A black linen scarf.

data.name: Black Leather Gauntlets
data.description: Reinforced leather gauntlets. A perfect fit.

data.name: Black Silk Pantaloons
data.description: A pair of spacious trousers made from fine silk. Sown together with cloth sandals for maximum comfort.

data.name: Tusk Medallion
data.description: A strange medallion. Fragments of a shattered boar tusk have been pieced together with an iron chain, forming a crude necklace.

data.name: Iron Punch Dagger
data.description: Some hoodlums are brawlers, some rogues are knife thugs. Some ruffians want the best of both underworlds.

parameters: Having tasted the strange brew, you begin to question the medical expertise of the nomads. Not only does it taste horrible, it actually seems to be toxic. Realizing that you've fallen prey to false advertising, you feel drunk and nauseous. Finally, you collapse and lose consciousness. Unfortunately, you never wake up again.

data.name: Miracle Cure
data.description: This glass vial contains a strange brew. It smells like alcohol.

data.name: Arrow
data.description: A bronze-tipped arrow.

data.name: Hunting Bow
data.description: A wooden hunting bow, previously owned by a druid from the Isle of Dusk.

data.name: Moonshine
data.description: A painted clay jug. It reeks of foul spirits.

parameters: agility

data.name: Dread Root
data.description: A rare medicinal ingredient, known for its miraculous effects. Some people grow addicted to chewing these dry roots, which have a bitter taste.

data.name: Bone Shield
data.description: A small round buckler, made from iron and the bones of animal carcasses. Two boar tusks adorn the center like crossed sabres.

parameters: Cold shivers tingle down your spine...
Cold shivers tingle down your spine...

data.name: Bone Crown
data.description: A cylindrical crown of tall spikes, made from boar tusks and ivory.

data.name: Iron Battle Axe
data.description: A two-handed axe. Faded runes are inscribed across the twin blades of this cumbersome weapon.

data.name: Iron Helmet
data.description: A heavy iron helmet with a jagged visor, sculpted to resemble the face of a wolf.

data.name: Crone River Eel
data.description: Fish. Charred and salted. A cut of Crone River Eel, the main sustenance and livelihood among the fishermen of Set.

data.name: Heavy Iron Greaves
data.description: Crudely sculpted and overly cumbersome, these dark iron greaves provide ample protection for the legs.

data.name: Heavy Iron War Gauntlets
data.description: Dark iron armguards. The heavy, interlocking segments of plate armor extend above the elbows.

data.name: Heavy Iron Chainmail
data.description: Crude and cumbersome, this dark iron chainmail shirt covers the head and torso.

data.name: Heavy Iron Mace
data.description: A massive war club, reinforced by iron bolts.

data.name: Iron Pike
data.description: A heavy, iron-tipped spear with considerable reach. Intended for two-handed, close combat.

data.name: Iron War Sickle
data.description: A heavy iron sickle. Its outward curvature is disrupted by sharp angles.

parameters: Carrying the heavy shield instills a feeling of invulnerability...

data.name: Black Iron Shield
data.description: A heavy round shield, reinforced by dark iron. Nigh impenetrable, yet cumbersome - the sheer size of it will provide a measure of safety.

data.name: Rope
data.description: A tool that can be used for many purposes.

data.name: Wolf Idol
data.description: Carved from one solid piece of wood, this angular sculpture has been made to resemble the Great Wolf; the god known as Phenris.

parameters: The pendant inspires a feeling of reverence. Praised be Phenris!

data.name: Silver Pendant
data.description: Jewelry. An heirloom pendant with an engraving of a wolf. Previously owned by a fisherman from the Town of Set.

data.name: Report One: The Tusk Mob
data.description: A sealed scroll, bearing the insignia of the Roeburgh Militia. It contains a written report by Chief Hadrian Trout.

data.name: Report Two: The Khiris Cartel
data.description: A sealed scroll, bearing the insignia of the Roeburgh Militia. It contains a written report by Chief Hadrian Trout.

parameters: The world seems darker now...

data.name: Gotterdammerung
data.description: A great helm, crafted from meteoric steel. Two massive horns have been placed on each side. It was discovered in the Underworld beneath Dusk Megalith.

data.name: Black Tunic
data.description: A black linen tunic of high quality.

data.name: Red Tunic
data.description: A red linen tunic of high quality.

data.name: White Tunic
data.description: A white linen tunic of high quality.

data.name: Black Cape
data.description: A black linen cape of a high quality.

data.name: White Cape
data.description: A white linen cape of high quality.

data.name: Red Cape
data.description: A red linen cape of high quality.

data.name: White Silk Gloves
data.description: Exquisite long gloves, ill-suited for combat.

data.name: Wool Cap
data.description: A simple hat, for the less discerning gentleman.

data.name: Black Beret
data.description: A black beret of high quality.

data.name: White Silk Scarf
data.description: Strictly for the fashionable crowd.

data.name: Clay Tablet
data.description: Strangely exotic, the runes that have been inscribed on this tablet are barely legible.

data.name: Advanced Lock Pick
data.description: A sophisticated tool, which can be used to disable the most complicated locks.

parameters: Time to do some damage...

data.name: Spiked Gauntlets
data.description: A pair of iron war gauntlets with large spikes protruding from the knuckles.

parameters: charisma

data.name: Exotic Perfume
data.description: A small glass vial containing a yellow liquid. Rubbing it on your skin will endow you with a pleasant fragrance.

data.name: Panossian Red Wine
data.description: A bottle of red wine, imported from the distant land of Panosa.

data.name: Phenrisian Cider
data.description: A bottle of pear cider, brewed by the monks of the Phenrisian Monastery.

data.name: Rondel Dagger
data.description: The long blade of this dagger is quite slim. Perfect for stabbing vital organs.

data.name: Stiletto
data.description: Flesh is the natural habitat of this narrow blade.

data.name: Iron Butcher Knife
data.description: The intimidation factor is hard to quantify.

data.name: Tattered Fur Mantle
data.description: This garment has seen frequent use, yet it will surely provide its wearer with warmth and protection.

data.name: Longbow
data.description: A large wooden bow with exceptional range. This deadly weapon is a work of exquisite craftmanship.

data.name: Map of Graefir Island
data.description: A crudely drawn map on a crumpled scrap of parchment. It shows the way to the Tomb of Hieronymus beyond the northern valley of Graefir Island.

data.name: A History of Graefir Island
data.description: A leather-bound book. It contains a druid perspective on the history of Graefir Island, authored by Sage Ephemeron.

data.name: Bronze Key
data.description: A small key. You found it in the attic of the smuggler's hideout on the Isle of Bast.

data.name: Palefoot Mushroom
data.description: An edible mushroom. Gray and white with dark spots. It can be harvested on the Isle of Bast.

data.name: Smuggler's Notebook
data.description: A small black book. It contains journal entries written by the smuggler known as Red Blake.

data.name: Sapphire
data.description: A blue gemstone, finely cut.

data.name: Iron Falchion
data.description: A single-edged, one-handed iron sabre. The pommel has been sculpted to resemble a howling wolf.

data.name: Studded Leather Boots
data.description: Black, reinforced leather boots, previously worn by a young Militia soldier.

data.name: Studded Leather Belt
data.description: A robust belt. The buckle has been sculpted to resemble the head of a wolf.

data.name: Studded Leather Gauntlets
data.description: Black, reinforced leather gauntlets, previously worn by a young Militia soldier.

data.name: Studded Leather Helmet
data.description: A black, reinforced leather helmet, previously worn by a young Militia soldier.

data.name: Iron Scale Hauberk
data.description: A short-sleeved shirt of scale mail armor. Originates from the distant continent of Qad'Malon.

data.name: Iron Scale Helmet
data.description: A nasal helmet with a scale mail coif. Originates from the distant continent of Qad'Malon.

data.name: Iron Scale Gauntlets
data.description: Heavy iron scale war gauntlets. Originates from the distant continent of Qad'Malon.

data.name: Iron Scale Greaves
data.description: Elaborately constructed, the interlocking sections of armor plates are reinforced by thick scales. Originates from the distant continent of Qad'Malon.

data.name: Heavy Iron Flail
data.description: A spiked iron ball, attached to a chain with a handle.

data.name: Raven's Beak
data.description: A sharp war hammer. The head has been sculpted to resemble a raven's beak. Originates from the distant continent of Qad'Malon.

data.name: Red Tower Shield
data.description: A large rectangular shield. The intarsia depicts a golden chimera, symbolic of the imperial power of Qad'Malon.

data.name: Black Leather Hauberk
data.description: A shirt made from hardened leather, with studded pauldrons. Originates from the distant continent of Qad'Malon.

data.name: Studded Black Leather Helmet
data.description: A full helmet made from hardened leather. Originates from the distant continent of Qad'Malon.

data.name: Snake Dagger
data.description: A short iron dagger. The handle has been sculpted to resemble a coiled serpent.

data.name: Coded Message
data.description: A coded message has been written on this parchment. It doesn't make any sense to you. The intented recipient is the lord of Highcastle.

data.name: Roeburghian White Wine
data.description: A bottle of white wine, originating from the vineyards of Lord's Peninsula.

data.name: Maleqite Brandy
data.description: A bottle of fine spirits, imported from the lowlands of Malequiem. Not for the weak of heart.

data.name: Room Key
data.description: Runes have been engraved on this small silver key. The inscription reads: "Room Four". The key unlocks a private chamber on the second floor of the Stray Wolf Inn.

data.name: Brothel Token
data.description: A large copper coin. One side shows a lewd image of a woman. Runes have been inscribed on the other side of the coin: Golden Serpent Parlor House.

data.name: Mead
data.description: A corked bottle of honey-wine, which is a popular alcoholic beverage on the western highlands of Tem Khiris.

data.name: Temple Key
data.description: This ornate silver key has been sculpted to resemble a stingray.

data.name: Iron Halberd
data.description: A two-handed polearm, taken from the cold, dead hands of a colossal brute.

data.name: Iron Chainmail Shirt
data.description: Chainmail armor, covering the torso. Barely used.

data.name: Rawhide Bone
data.description: This chew toy was made to stifle the boredom of canines.

data.name: Cell Key
data.description: Runes have been sculpted on this small iron key. The inscription reads: "Holding Cell".

data.name: Steel Scimitar
data.description: A masterwork scimitar, crafted from the meteoric steel of Triniset.

parameters: Unnatural forces linger in the black runes of this red armband...

data.name: Red Stone Bracelet
data.description: Mysterious black runes have been carved into this bracelet. Cut from the elusive red rock, quarried on the Isle of Penance.

data.name: A New Breed of Slaves
data.description: A small brown book. No author is credited.

data.name: Black Slouch Hat
data.description: A black hat with a wide brim. Favored by the infamous crime lord known as Mantis.

data.name: Short Bow
data.description: A finely crafted wooden bow, imported from the Deadlands of Triniset.

data.name: Yellow Sark
data.description: A long shirt, which gives a lot of room to breathe. Favored by the nomads from the Deadlands of Triniset.

data.name: White Shawl
data.description: A soft and generously proportioned white shawl with fringes. This garment is favored by the nomads from the Deadlands of Triniset.

parameters: It's as if the soul of Ebiddon himself rests within this shield...

data.name: Desert Cavalry Shield
data.description: A large oval shield, favored by the nomads of Triniset. Blessed by the sigil of Ebiddon, a military leader from ancient times.

parameters: perception

data.name: Sacred Elixir
data.description: Contraband. The small bottle contains a dark blue liquid, concocted by the alchemists of Triniset. Popular among mystics and others who seek forbidden pleasures.

data.name: Gilded Plate Cuirass
data.description: Black iron plate armor, adorned with intricate golden patterns. Suitable for knights with deep pockets.

data.name: Iron Plate Greaves
data.description: Black iron plate armor, providing ample protection for the legs and feet.

data.name: Great Helm
data.description: A flat-topped, bucket-shaped iron helmet with breathing holes and horizontal apertures for the eyes.

data.name: Knightly Sword
data.description: This iron sword is traditionally favored by the knights of Roeburgh. It has a short hilt, made for single-handed use.

data.name: Steel Claymore
data.description: A massive two-handed sword, crafted from the meteoric steel of Triniset.

data.name: White Robe
data.description: A comfortable, outer garment. Remarkably high quality. Can be worn open or closed.

data.name: Kidskin Gloves
data.description: White leather gloves, made from the skin of young goats.

data.name: White Cloth Sandals
data.description: Simple and comfortable footwear.

data.name: Domino Mask
data.description: A black eye mask, suitable for festive occasions.

data.name: Wool Coat
data.description: A long gray coat. Provides warmth and comfort. The work of a master tailor.

data.name: Black Silk Jacket
data.description: A fine waistcoat with pockets and long sleeves.

data.name: Black Bonnet
data.description: A flat wool cap with ribbons on the back.

data.name: Cravat
data.description: A stylish neckband, made for the discerning nobleman.

data.name: Winged Iron Helmet
data.description: A nasal helmet with wings on the sides. Traditionally worn by the knights of Roeburgh.

data.name: Chronicles of Mantis
data.description: A memoir written by Mantis the Crime Lord.

data.name: Maul Hammer
data.description: A wood-headed maul with a long shaft, intended for two-handed use.

data.name: Steel Dagger
data.description: A masterwork dagger. Long and sharp, the blade is crafted from the meteoric steel of Triniset.

parameters: You feel empowered by the blessing of this sacred relic...

data.name: Wolf Medallion
data.description: A silver medallion with an iron chain. It has been sculpted to resemble the face of a wolf. The relic was blessed by the preacher of Noble Heights.

parameters: The sacred relic inspires a feeling of confidence...

data.name: Fire Medallion
data.description: A golden medallion with an iron chain. A wreath of flames, forming a circle around nine eyes. This relic was blessed by the preacher of Noble Heights.

parameters: The relic inspires a greater awareness of the world around you...

data.name: Rook Medallion
data.description: A silver medallion with an iron chain. Sculpted to resemble the silhouette of a rook. This sacred relic was blessed by the preacher of Noble Heights.

data.name: Green Apple
data.description: Fruit. Restores a small amount of health.

data.name: Iron Buckler
data.description: A small round iron-plated wooden shield.

data.name: Highland Targe
data.description: An iron-plated wooden buckler. This small round shield is the work of a master.

data.name: War Staff
data.description: A long wooden staff, reinforced by a few iron bands. Crafted by the druids of Graefir Island.

data.name: Iron War Hammer
data.description: A heavy iron maul, intended for two-handed use. Crafted by a master blacksmith.

data.name: Formal Invitation
data.description: This document will allow you to gain access to the Sleep Temple. It is signed by Cleo Verdandi.

data.name: Sharpened Stick
data.description: A sharp wooden stick. This primitive weapon can be used with one hand.

data.name: Spiked Club
data.description: A wooden cudgel with rusty iron spikes.

data.name: Bronze Glaive
data.description: A long polearm with a curved blade attached to the end.

data.name: Cloth Bracers
data.description: A pair of green cloth bracers, covering the wrists and forearms.

data.name: Fur Tunic
data.description: A patchwork fur tunic, made from wolf hides.

parameters: stanched

data.name: Sanguine Draught
data.description: A small glass vial of red liquid. This alchemical potion prevents bleeding. It must be consumed before engaging in combat.

parameters: The smell of brimstone...

data.name: Crown of Wildflowers
data.description: A wreath of colorful wildflowers from the rainswept grasslands of Roe. It was a gift from an evil druid.
